channel.title: Installing ubuntu
channel.description:
I'm about to install ubuntu and I want it as a dual boot with windows. I'm confused about the partitions and stuff. so this is where I'm at:
[img]http://img30.imageshack.us/img30/4035/screenshotojy.png[/img]
what partition do I choose if I don't want to overwrite windows?
EDIT: fixed it, I had to change the size of my windows 7 partition so that ubuntu had space to install. Now I have my fancy dual boot!

item.title: Installing ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @sp11k3t3ht3rd sp11k3t3ht3rd
item.description:
@sp11k3t3ht3rd wrote:

The options that came up were install ubuntu over windows 7 or do something else. This is that something else screen. It’s not that I can’t remember the name of the option. Thats what it was called.

these are the options it gives me:

EDIT: Fixed. Read the edit of the first post.

Read full topic

item.title: Installing ubuntu
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Normally if you want to dual boot you do it while installing, at least that’s how I did it…

Read full topic
